title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Practice emergency scenarios
description:
In this how to we are going to look how you can practice emergency scenarios in MSFS 2020. We are going to look at two different aircrafts which experience engine failures caused by fire. Besides the fire scenario other scenarios are available but we don't look at these in this video.
